data.title: King Ludwig III of Bavaria
data.meta_description: King Ludwig III of Bavaria. Self: Mutual Weekly, No. 16. King Ludwig III of Bavaria was born on 7 January 1845 in Munich, Kingdom of Bavaria [now Bavaria, Germany]. He was married to Maria-Theresia von Habsburg. He died on 18 October 1921 in Sarvar, Hungary.
data.text: Thirteen children (of whom eleven survived to adulthood) with Maria-Theresia von Habsburg, Archduchess of Austria: Prince Ruprecht von Wittlesbach, born 18 May 1869; Princess Adelgunde von Wittlesbach, born 17 October 1870; Princess Marie von Wittlesbach, born 6 July 1872; Prince Karl von Wittlesbach, born 1874; Prince Franz von Wittlesbach, born 10 October 1875; Princess Mathilde von Wittlesbach, born 17 August 1877; Prince Wolfgang von Wittlesbach, born 1879; Princess Hildegarde von Wittlesbach, born 5 March 1881; Princess Notburga von Wittlesbach, born and died 1883; Princess Wiltrude von Wittlesbach, born 10 November 1884; Princess Helmtrude von Wittlesbach, born 1886; Princess Dietlinde von Wittlesbach, born 1888 and died 1889; and Princess Gundelinde von Wittlesbach, born 26 August 1891.
